educations.schoolName: California Polytechnic State University-San Luis Obispo

headline: Deputy Assistant Executive Director at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: Specialties: Policy Analysis and Development, Strategic Planning and Analysis, Program Management, Systems Engineering, Enterprise Architecture

defaultPosition.description: Leads a multidisciplinary division responsible for planning and coordinating ICE operational, administrative resources, and functions related to law enforcement information sharing and statistical reporting programs.  This includes providing expert law enforcement information sharing policy, strategic planning, and program planning support to ICE and the U.S. Department of Homeland Security, and ensuring proper safeguarding and adherence to policy, procedures, and laws regarding law enforcement information sharing activities with federal, state, local, and foreign partners.
defaultPosition.title: Deputy Assistant Executive Director

positions.description: Leads a multidisciplinary division responsible for planning and coordinating ICE operational, administrative resources, and functions related to law enforcement information sharing and statistical reporting programs.  This includes providing expert law enforcement information sharing policy, strategic planning, and program planning support to ICE and the U.S. Department of Homeland Security, and ensuring proper safeguarding and adherence to policy, procedures, and laws regarding law enforcement information sharing activities with federal, state, local, and foreign partners.
positions.title: Deputy Assistant Executive Director

positions.description: Led strategic program planning and priorities development efforts to guide interagency homeland security information sharing and analysis, program management for multi-mission threat information sharing, program development of critical infrastructure threat information sharing to the private sector, and enterprise resource planning.
positions.title: Director, Information Sharing and Intelligence Enterprise Management Division

positions.description: Led teams providing information and knowledge management systems planning and technology standardization support for civil and national/homeland security communities.
positions.title: Director, Capabilities-based Information Analytics

positions.description: Senior staff lead for award winning architecture and common standards programs supporting nationwide homeland security information sharing.
positions.title: Senior Policy Advisor

positions.description: Responsible for the development and implementation of information technology policies, standards, cyber security, and modernization strategies for a new company supporting the Department of Energy.
positions.title: Vice President and Chief Technology Officer

positions.description: Directed a division providing technical advice and support to the government leadership of a 6,000-person national security space systems operations organization.
positions.title: Systems Director

positions.companyName: The White House Military Office and the White House Communications Agency
positions.description: The Office's equivalent Chief Technology Officer role responsible for strategic planning, policy, systems integration, continuity of operations, and architecture development for national security assets supporting the President, Vice President, and White House senior staff.  Led teams providing telecommunications support to the President during numerous domestic and overseas trips including historic trips to Africa, Israel, and Ireland.
positions.title: Director, Information Technology Management / Presidential Communications Officer

positions.description: Led a 219-person organization providing telecommunications and information technology engineering, installation, and operations and maintenance support to 5,000 agency headquarters customers.
positions.title: Commander

positions.description: Directed satellite ground support and operations, contract management and source selection activity.
positions.title: Chief of Mission Support

positions.description: Directed development, testing, and use of ground systems supporting launch and on-orbit operations.
positions.title: Satellite Operations Director
